departments.name: SCHOOL OF ENGINEERING
departments.description: Btech and Mtech in various branches ranging from conventional courses such as Civil/Mechanical/Electronics/Computer Science to rare courses such as Information Technology and Safety and Fire Engg. Are offered.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF ELECTRONICS
departments.description: COURSES OFFERED:Msc in Electronic Science,Mtech in Electronics Comm. Engg,Phd in Electronics

departments.name: SCHOOL OF LEGAL STUDIES
departments.description: Advanced Legal Aid Clinic for undergraduate,postgraduate and research work/studies.

departments.name: SCHOOL OF MANAGEMENT STUDIES
departments.description: Has both full time and part time courses for Management Studies in International Business and Travel and Tourism.Options for Phd and Mphil Programmes are also avalable.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF INSTRUMENTATION
departments.description: Courses in Btech,Msc and Phd in Instrumentation engineering are the main attraction.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER APPLICATION
departments.description: Courses in highlight include MCA and Msc in computer science and technology.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF STATISTICS
departments.description: Mtech in Engg Statistics,Phd and Msc in Statistics are the academic programmes offered.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF POLYMER SCIENCE AND RUBBER TECHNOLOGY
departments.description: PSRT has  Btech , Metch and Phd Programmes in Polymer Science Engg.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF SHIP TECHNOLOGY
departments.description: Ship Technology and design courses including Btech in Naval Architecture and Ship Building and Mtech in Computer Aided Structural Analysis and Research are much sought novelties.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF HINDI
departments.description: M.A , M.Phil,Phd courses in Hindi are undertaken.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF MATHEMATICS
departments.description: Caters to courses in Msc ,Mphil and Phd in Mathematics

departments.name: INTERNATIONAL SCHOOL OF PHOTONICS
departments.description: Main courses include Btech and Mtech in Opto Electronics and LASER technology.

departments.name: DEPARTMENT OF BIOTECHNOLOGY
departments.description: Msc and Phd in Biotechnology are the stellar courses at hand.

departments.name: C-SIS
departments.description: A fully functional Science Park with Sciene Pavillions , Math and Computer Labs among other points of interest
